name: FetHead
description: low-noise, high quality, in-line microphone preamplifier. It provides improved sound for Ribbon and Dynamic microphones with 27 dB gain. FetHead's circuit uses 48v phantom power but shields it from the microphone, the microphone is protected.

name: key light or fill light
description: 3 possible light temperatures: warm white, neutral white and cool white. Each light colour can be adjusted in 10 different brightnesses.

name: back light
description: Yongnuo YN 300 LED Video Light 5500 K

name: softbox
description: Softbox Diffuser for Yongnuo YN300 III
SMALLRIG Magic Arm field monitor mount with 1/4 inch ball head screw
